definition: to agree/to consent/to be ready (to do sth)/willing
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: Low water levels caused the country's largest hydropower dam to be shut down last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月，低水位使得肯尼亚最大的水力大坝被迫关闭。

sentences.english: There was a "dangerous cosiness" between the bank and Kenya's government.
sentences.chinese: 世行与肯尼亚政府之间总有种暧昧的“危险的默契”。

sentences.english: In Kenya the Massai people usually greet each other by spitting on his or her body.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亚马塞族人用往对方身上吐口水的方式打招呼。

sentences.english: Lions attack a buffalo on the Masai Mara in Kenya
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亚马塞马拉，狮子袭击一只水牛。

sentences.english: I need a brochure for a water-engineering firm based in Nairobi, Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 我需要在内罗毕，肯尼亚的节水型工程公司的小册子。

sentences.english: Obama recalled his father, an émigré from Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马回想起他的父亲，一个肯尼亚移民。

sentences.english: The vigilante group had vowed yesterday to extend the operation all over Central Kenya
sentences.chinese: 民团昨天曾誓言要把他们的行动扩大到肯尼亚中部。

sentences.english: In northern Kenya, scores die every year in clashes over watering holes and cattle.
sentences.chinese: 在肯尼亚北部，每年死于得分超过浇水洞和牛的冲突。

sentences.english: Illegal weapons are set aflame in Nairobi, Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 在内罗毕非法枪支被销毁，肯尼亚。

sentences.english: He and his family had been living in a refugee camp in Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 他和家人此前一直生活在肯尼亚一个难民营中。

sentences.english: This was true in sixty-two percent of couples in Ivory Coast and Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 在象牙海岸和肯尼亚62%的夫妻的情况确实是这样。

sentences.english: 1963 - Kenya gains its independence from the United Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 1963年的今天，肯尼亚脱离英国获得独立。

sentences.english: Naivasha to Nairobi, Kenya's road is one of the busiest highways .
sentences.chinese: 奈瓦沙到内罗毕的公路是肯尼亚最繁忙的公路之一。

sentences.english: In Kenya , for example, panel cookers are being manufactured for just $2.
sentences.chinese: 举个例子，在肯尼亚，面板式炉具的制作仅需2美元。

sentences.english: A girl stood outside a school in the Mukuru kwa Njenga slum in Nairobi, Kenya, Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 一名小女孩站在贫民区学校的墙外，内罗毕，肯尼亚。

sentences.english: I spent a lot of time in a Muslim community in Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 我在肯尼亚的一个穆斯林社区生活了很长时间。

definition: Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
